<< About Us >> Our History Image representing about us D’ Original Lola Berta’s Lechon honors the legacy of Lamberta Tañga vda de Ramos, fondly known as "Lola Berta," the esteemed matriarch of the Tañga family in Pateros, Rizal. With a discerning eye for excellence, Lola Berta traversed distant provinces to personally select prime pigs for her customers. Image representing traditional lechon preparation Upon returning to the family compound in Pateros, these carefully chosen pigs were prepared only upon order, ensuring unparalleled freshness and delight for patrons. Each lechon is meticulously stuffed with fragrant banana leaves and slow-roasted in the time-honored tradition over smoldering charcoal pits, resulting in a perfect harmony of consistency and quality.
